ANU.biography: He is a Fellow of the Australian Academy of Technological Sciences and Engineering, a Fellow of the Institution of Engineers Australia and a Life Fellow of the IEEE. John is President of the International Society for Digital Earth.  His research interests are in image interpretation and imaging radar.
